game.name: Murderous Sunlight
game.categories: Single-player, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: In a dark world where Holy mages rewrite probability and Profane forces trap the dead in eternal patterns, Murderous Sunlight blends exploration, psychological depth, and occasional combat in an unsettling journey. Unravel a linear, character-driven story about trauma, identity, and defiance.
